problem.markdown:
1. Sectionalisers should have breakers (or relays with breakers) or reclosers working as a backup device. True or False?
() False (x) True
2. Zone of operation of the fuse is limited by
(x) Both minimum melting time and maximum clearing time () Maximum clearing time () Minimum melting time () None
3. Consider 5P20 class CT ratio: 1000/1, Normal rated current of 900 A. Consider a overloading of 10 % while calculating plug setting of the relay. Let the initial set TMS be 0.15. Relay settings has ranges for PSM of 50% to 200% in steps of 25% and TMS setting range of 0.1 to 1.1 in step of 0.05. The operating time for a three phase fault of 10 kA is less for
() IEC Normal inverse () Same in all the cases (x) IEC Extreme inverse () IEC Very inverse 4. Autoreclosers are more attractive than relays in distribution feeder protection as
() It has inbuilt breaker () It has more number of shot capability (x) Both it has inbuilt breaker and it has more number of shot capability () None of the above
5. Zone of operation of the fuse is limited by
() Minimum melting time () None () Maximum clearing time (x) Both minimum melting time and maximum clearing time
problem.p: 1. Sectionalisers should have breakers (or relays with breakers) or reclosers working as a backup device. True or False?
2. Zone of operation of the fuse is limited by

choicegroup.choice: Both minimum melting time and maximum clearing time

problem.p: 3. Consider 5P20 class CT ratio: 1000/1, Normal rated current of 900 A. Consider a overloading of 10 % while calculating plug setting of the relay. Let the initial set TMS be 0.15. Relay settings has ranges for PSM of 50% to 200% in steps of 25% and TMS setting range of 0.1 to 1.1 in step of 0.05. The operating time for a three phase fault of 10 kA is less for
4. Autoreclosers are more attractive than relays in distribution feeder protection as

choicegroup.choice: It has more number of shot capability
Both it has inbuilt breaker and it has more number of shot capability

problem.p: 5. Zone of operation of the fuse is limited by

choicegroup.choice: Both minimum melting time and maximum clearing time
